content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of 6 building blocks arranged in 3 layers:
- Bottom layer: 3 orange triangular/wedge blocks
- Middle layer: 1 orange cylindrical block
- Top layer: 1 red block with a U-shaped cutout and 2 yellow semi-cylindrical blocks on top

## Spatial Relationships
- The bottom layer has three orange triangular blocks positioned like feet - one on the left, one on the right, and one at the back (partially visible)
- The middle layer has a vertical orange cylindrical block placed centrally on top of the triangular blocks
- The top layer has a red rectangular block with a U-shaped cutout placed on top of the cylindrical block
- Two yellow semi-cylindrical blocks are placed on top of the red block, one on each side of the U-shape

# Required Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks:
- Block #8: Orange vertical cylindrical block for the middle layer
- Block #14, #15, and #16: Orange triangular/wedge blocks for the bottom layer (feet)
- Block #3: Red U-shaped block for the top layer
- Block #10 and #11: Yellow semi-cylindrical blocks for the top of the structure

# Assembly Order

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 8
  Step2: Move block with index 14
  Step3: Move block with index 15
  Step4: Move block with index 16
  Step5: Move block with index 3
  Step6: Move block with index 10
  Step7: Move block with index 11
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with the central cylindrical support, adds the triangular feet around it, places the red U-shaped block on top, and finishes with the two yellow semi-cylindrical blocks on the very top.
